entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned multiple times throughout the text.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wizard and a professor at Hogwarts, described as chuckling merrily at a joke.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: A professor who reads a joke to Dumbledore, causing him to laugh.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: One of the characters at the table, mentioned as nearly breaking his teeth on a silver sickle.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper and professor at Hogwarts, described as getting redder in the face while calling for more wine.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: A professor who is kissed on the cheek by Hagrid, causing her to giggle and blush.

entities.name: norris
entities.description: Mrs. Norris, a character mentioned as possibly eating the white mice for Christmas dinner.

entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasley family, mentioned as spending a happy afternoon having a snowball fight with Harry.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore are at the same table, with Dumbledore chuckling merrily at a joke read by Professor Flitwick.
Hagrid kisses McGonagall on the cheek, causing her to giggle and blush.
Harry spends a happy afternoon having a snowball fight with the Weasley family in the grounds.
